wheat.fertilizer: Use 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 40 kg K per hectare.
wheat.pesticide: Apply Chlorpyrifos @ 2.5 ml/litre water for pests.

rice.fertilizer: Use 100 kg N, 50 kg P, 50 kg K per hectare.
rice.pesticide: Apply Monocrotophos @ 2 ml/litre water for stem borers.

maize.fertilizer: Use 150 kg N, 75 kg P, 40 kg K per hectare.

cotton.fertilizer: Use 100 kg N, 50 kg P, 50 kg K per hectare.
